(1)204-222-4888

Based in Winnipeg, Manitoba. Eastend Meats & Sausage, a long-established, government inspected processing facility and retail meat shop, located in the Transcona neighborhoods - the heart of Canada. It is home of Al's Homestyle Smoked Sausages & Deli Meats.
